title: AxiCorp
description: AxiCorp is a provider of margin Forex trading services for the retail and institutional markets.
header_text: Founded in Sydney, Australia in 2007, AxiCorp was created by traders, for traders.
paragraph_text: This web site is administered by AxiCorp Financial Services Pty Ltd (AxiCorp) with its principal place of business located at Level 10, 90 Arthur Street, North Sydney, Australia, and registered in The Netherlands, and registered in Australia (ACN 127 606 348) and authorised and regulated by the Australian Securities & Investments Commission (ASIC) AFSL number 318232.

When you visit this web site AxiCorp may collect personal data about you, either directly (where you are asked to provide the data) or indirectly. AxiCorp will, however, only use these personal data in accordance with the purposes set forth in this Privacy Statement and is committed to safeguarding the personal information collected. This statement sets out the purposes of AxiCorp data processing in respect of this web site, the use of cookies and how to effect your rights in respect of your personal data.

AxiCorp collects and processes information about customers and visitors to its web site to conduct its business, to inform and make available products and services that may be of interest to you and for the development of web statistics. The information you provide will be used to contact you when necessary, e.g. to notify you about functionality changes to the web site and to offer services that you may find helpful (provided you have not opted out to receive such services).

AxiCorp does not seek to collect sensitive personal data (such as data revealing political opinions, religious beliefs, health or other matters) through this site. If AxiCorp does seek to collect such data, your prior (explicit) consent hereto will be asked. Please note that, by providing AxiCorp with unsolicited sensitive personal data you (explicitly) consent to our using those data as described above.

AxiCorp may collect and analyse information in connection with the use of his web site, such as domain name, the number of hits, the pages visited, previous/subsequent sites visited and length of user session. This information may be collected by using cookies. A cookie is a small text file containing relevant information which our webpage-server can extract from your browser. Our webpage-server may only require cookies that relate to information that has been exchanged between you and AxiCorp through internet. Cookies not containing any security sensitive information can be stored on your hard disk in such a manner that they are available during the next visit. The only cookie that is saved from the secured domain on the hard disk is the cookie that is used for retaining pass number on the login page. You can allow the use of cookies or prevent this by changing the settings of your browser. If you prevent the use of cookies, the mentioned information shall no longer be stored by your browser and with every visit your information shall be required and shall have to be completed again.
Please note that this Privacy Statement does not extend to third party sites linked to this web site.
AxiCorp welcomes enquiries from prospective partners around the world. For more information please contact us.
AXICORP FINANCIAL SERVICES PTY LTD DISCLAIMER

AxiCorp (ACN 127 606 348) is authorised and regulated by the Australian Securities & Investments Commission (ASIC) AFSL number 318232. Investing in over-the-counter derivatives carries significant risks and is not suitable for all investors. You could lose substantially more than your initial investment. When acquiring our derivative products you have no entitlement, right or obligation to the underlying financial asset. AxiCorp is not a financial adviser and all services are provided on an execution only basis. AxiCorp is authorised to provide general advice only and information is of a general nature only and does not take into account your financial objectives, personal circumstances. AxiCorp recommends that you seek independent personal financial advice. Any views or opinions expressed do not necessarily represent those of AxiCorp.
A world leader in online margin trading and institutional financial services
Our flagship retail trading service for FX, CFDs, Commodities, Indices, Cryptocurrency CFDs & more
A premium Prime Brokerage service for high volume, high net worth and institutional grade clients
Our dedicated business for low rate, low fee and secure international payments
Our goal is to provide you with the ultimate trading experience. We're passionate about online trading, constantly innovating and looking to improve the way our clients invest in financial markets.
*Based on financial statements audited by Ernst & Young

We have grown to offer a modern, multifaceted Forex trading experience based on combining the latest trading technology with old fashioned values of honesty, transparency, trust and award-winning customer service.
Since being founded in 2007, AxiCorp has grown into a truly global business with offices in Sydney, London and Dubai.
